text: The Savannah Machine & Foundry Company was an American shipbuilder, in Savannah, Georgia, founded in 1912. It was founded by Walter Lee Mingledorf. It was sold in 1968 to Aegis Corporation. It built a series of Auk-class and Admirable-class minesweepers for the U.S. Navy as well as salvage ships. ==References== Category:Manufacturing plants in the United States Category:Shipbuilding companies of the United States Category:Shipyards of the United States Category:Industrial buildings and structures in Georgia (U.S. state)
title: Savannah Machine & Foundry
